entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
